page.content_html:
Position: Deputy Director of Diagnostic Center Mavin Pigfarm

Working address: Thi Tu Bo Thoi, Hong Tien, Khoai Chau, Hung Yen & No. 6, Nguyen Huu Tho, Hoang Mai, Hanoi

JOB DESCRIPTION

- Deploying and assigning work to employees according to the Company's organizational model;

- Formulate, standardize and develop examination methods;

- Control and evaluate the quality of test results;

- Establish and supervise the implementation of testing and screening programs;

- Manage data, analyze and secure data according to regulations;

- Professional training for affiliated staff and for other departments (if any);

- Implement reports, plans, programs... according to regulations and requirements (if any)

- Perform other tasks as assigned by the Director of CLC and indirect superiors

JOB REQUIREMENTS

- Professional degree: biotechnology, molecular biology from university or higher;

- Foreign languages ​​and informatics: good at reading and writing specialized English; Proficient in office information technology;

- Experience: have experience in the field of (i) molecular biology analysis techniques (PCR, real time PCR, Elisa, ...), have experience in microbiology, antibiotic chart, analytical chemistry, ... an advantage.

- Skills in planning, analysis-synthesis-evaluation, report writing, teamwork-coordination, presentation-persuasion, proactive-independent work, communication: good.

* RIGHT:

- Negotiable income according to capacity

- Participate in professional training courses at the Company.

-Fully equipped with labor protection to serve the job.

- Welfare: according to the provisions of the Labor Code and other remuneration policies of the company (phone, car parking, holiday bonus, Tet ...)

- Day off: According to the current Labor Code regulations

* CONTACT INFO: Interested candidates, please send your CV via email: Tuyendung@mavinfarm.com

- Or contact Ms. Tuyen directly, Tel: 0989.539.856.
